effect.shortEffect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.

description.black-white: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
description.black-2-white-2: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
description.x-y: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.sun-moon: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
description.sword-shield: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
